dcterms:creator: Kieran A. Murphy
Carlos Esteves
Varun Jampani
Srikumar Ramalingam
Ameesh Makadia
dcterms:description: SYMSOL is a dataset specifically designed for evaluating density estimators in the SO(3) space. It comprises 250k images of five texture-less and symmetric objects, with each subject to random rotations.
dcterms:title: SYMSOL

dcterms:description: SYMSOL-T is a new synthetic dataset developed in this paper, based on the original SYMSOL dataset. It enhances the original dataset with randomly sampled translations, providing a more rigorous testbed for evaluating methods in capturing the joint density of object rotations and translations.
dcterms:title: SYMSOL-T

dcterms:creator: Tomáš Hodan
Pavel Haluza
Štěpán Obdržálek
Jiri Matas
Manolis Lourakis
Xenophon Zabulis
dcterms:description: T-LESS is a challenging benchmark dataset for 6D pose estimation of texture-less industrial objects. It consists of thirty objects characterized by a range of discrete and continuous symmetries, with pose ambiguities arising from both intrinsic object symmetries and environmental factors.
dcterms:title: T-LESS
